title: We’re getting another Prime Day event in October this year
description: Amazon announced another shopping holiday for Prime members: Prime Big Deal Days. Here's everything we know about the sales event.

title: The gamers have spoken: AMD obliterates Intel in CPU sales
description: AMD's 3D V-Cache chips continue to top charts, and that includes even the last-gen 5800X3D. New figures show AMD obliterating Intel on CPU sales.

title: We’re finally getting a 4K OLED gaming monitor, and it’s coming soon
description: Dough has just unveiled its upcoming gaming monitor -- a 4K OLED screen with a 240Hz refresh rate -- and it might be the first of its kind.

title: Nvidia Workbench lets anyone train an AI model
description: Nvidia has just announced AI Workbench, a platform that makes generative AI a lot more approachable than ever before.
